reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and appreciate its thick, breathable fabric that's not sheer.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wedding guest dress!!
items.body: I bought this dress for a friend’s cocktail attire wedding and let me tell you.. it was perfect!! Just the right amount of class and sexiness, all wrapped together in this stretchy and quite comfortable little number. I went bra-less as the fabric quality is nice and doesn’t show anything through. Love the high slit, but beware if you plan to drop it low on the dance floor- you will show some skin! I got so many compliments on the color (berry) and it was perfect fall standout without being obnoxious. I went with an ordered a small and medium, but kept the small for a more fitted look. The fabric around the middle is very forgiving- which I appreciate as a mom with a little extra in the mid section. Would 100% recommend!! Read more
items.author: Roxanne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars the fit hides your belly
items.body: love the dress, it fits well and hides your belly. The fabric is quite thick, so it hides imperfections. It makes your boobs more perky, by how it is sewed Read more
items.author: wendy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Comfortable, and Sexy
items.body: I bought this dress for a birthday outing with my husband. He told me to wear something fashionable and comfortable shoes so I ordered this even though I didn't know our plans. It is not see-through (at least the red one is not) and the material is comfortable and moves with you. The slit is high so be careful. The cups in the bust area have a slight pointy look and are not seamless. This aspect didn't bother me much but may be undesirable to some people. I didn't have to adjust throughout the night. I wore it with short heels. The front has some ruching which helps hide some imperfections. It doesn't cover the legs or arms so if you're concerned about that, this dress isnt the one for you. It's not a dress that you can easily wear smoothing garments or underwear. The dress was a little long (I'm 5'2") but it wasn't absurdly long. It would be even better with higher heels. It flowed well throughout the night and felt secure and study. I received a ton of compliments. My husband rented a yacht for us and 50 close friends and we had a great night dancing, eating, and drinking on the water. Read more
items.author: Stephanie W

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: Such a cute dress! Well made fabric, not see through. Looks and feels a lot more expensive than it was. Bought a large and fit perfectly. Not tight, not loose. Love it for the wedding im attending. Read more
items.author: Brittany

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars The fit is not it- size down.
items.body: I am 5’5”, 135lbs, and a B/C cup. I wanted this dress to work sooo bad. Some reviews were complaining about the material- it’s the same material used for exercise dresses/skirts. Super comfy, stretchy, a little on the thicker side, and not see through at all. Downsides- the fit was just not it for me. I sometimes bounce between a small and medium. If you’re typically between a medium/large, medium is right for you. The dress was long, even with heals on. Prob an inch longer than it needed to be. The stomach area was loose and floppy- not flattering at all. The back fit VERY well and love the adjustable straps! The cups were just wrong. Way too big (for me) and had little points on them. Even if I did fill out the cups, I’m pretty sure it would still look like nipples! I ordered a size small in hopes that it’ll fit better because I love the idea of this dress, and the material. We’ll see! Read more
items.author: Maddy O

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing!
items.body: This dress is absolutely gorgeous!! I was worried because I ordered last minute for an event, but it did not disappoint. It was super comfortable and easy to dance in. Read more
items.author: Mary Munoz

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very long
items.body: Very long but nice Read more
items.author: Stephanie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t hesitate, just buy it!!
items.body: I am so happy I bought this dress! I was hesitant but it is honestly so flattering! I’m 5’9” and I thought the slit was at a good height even with my heels on. Good material. I don’t think it’s loose, it fits just right. If you want a a more fitted look you’re def ok to size down, otherwise your regular size is good. I got so many compliments and I was definitely feeling myself in it. Buy it, you won’t regret it! Read more
items.author: Julie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Bodycon Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Bodycon Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Purple, Burgundy, Royalblue, Black, Navyblue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
